mean_cn: v. 期满，（期限）终止，断气，死亡
mean_en: (of a document, an agreement, etc.) to be no longer valid because the period of time for which it could be used has ended
word_etyma: ex出+pir=spir呼吸+e强调→只出气不进气→断气；期满
sentence: This card is already expired, so let me cut it up for you.
sentence_trans: 这张卡片已经到期了，让我帮你剪掉吧。
